turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey, I would like an order from Starbucks, would you mind assisting me?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Of course! Since there are several locations which Starbucks location would you prefer?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: My favorite location, and the one I prefer, is at the 704 N MO-7 one in Blue Springs near my office.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Perfect, just let me know what kind of drink you would like.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'm thinking an Iced Caramel Brulee Latte.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I love that drink. What size would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want the Grande, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, and what type of milk?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want the Almond Milk, and if they are out of that I would like the Coconut Milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you want it topped with anything?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, I would like whipped cream on top.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: This drink also comes with Caramel Brulee Topping, would that be okay?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: What is included in that topping?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sugar, corn syrup, natural flavors, and fruit & vegetable colors, how do you feel about those ingredients?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I really try to stay away from corn syrup, can you have them hold that topping?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes, I can make sure that is not added to your order. Do you have any nut allergies?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, do they include nuts?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No, nuts are not included, but they cannot guarantee that their products are free from allergens.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Oh, alright. How long will it take for you to place my order?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I'm placing your order as we speak, and I can get it delivered to you as soon as it is made. Is that fine?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, that sounds good.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: So, I placed an order for an Iced Caramel Brulee Latte, with Almond Milk, and whipped topping, correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: If there is no Almond milk you want coconut milk, correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You want the drink made at your favorite location, which is 704 N MO-7 in Blue Springs near your office, right?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, that is correct.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your drink will be ready shortly for pickup, and you will get a confirmation text when it is ready. Is that all you need at the moment?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, thank you so much, bye-bye.
